repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: First Universalist Church of Charlestown Communion Set

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Item was found uncataloged in the stacks in 2007. According to its inscription, the flagon was donated in 1823 by John Kettell, Esq. to the First Universalist Church of Charlestown. The goblets are inscribed "First Universalist Church, Charlestown 1842."

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one inscribed silver plated "Communion set" consisting of a flagon and four goblets stored in a 19th-century wooden box. The box is lined inside with purple velvet and covered on the outside with black canvas. One inscribed silver coin "Communion" set consisting of a covered pitcher and four goblets.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. No documentation is available regarding the intellectual property rights in this collection.

did.unittitle: First Universalist Church of Charlestown Communion Set

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a silver plated flagon and four goblets. A note associated with these items describes them as an "Engraved silver Communion set belonging to the First Universalist Church of Charlestown."
These items were found with other unprocessed historical material. Therefore provenance and identification are provisional.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The inscription on the flagon reads: The gift of Jonh Kettell Esq. to the First Universalist Church of Charlestown, 1823.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The inscription on the goblets reads: The First Universalist Church, Charlestown 1842. Instituted in 1811.
